item.title: Open source - Beyond Bitcoin Core
item.description: Open source: Beyond Bitcoin Core He is at Bitpay, working on copay, bitcore, foxtrot, and their blockchain explorer. First of all, a little bit about Bitpay. We were actually founded in May 2011. We have been around for some time. At the time, MtGox was actually still a viable exchange. The Bitcoin price was down at about $1 or a little more. And we had a grand total of two merchants.
